items.title: Anthropic Revokes OpenAI's Access to Claude
items.description: OpenAI lost access to the Claude API this week after Anthropic claimed the company was violating its terms of service.

items.title: WIRED Roundup: ChatGPT Goes Full Demon Mode
items.description: On today’s episode of Uncanny Valley, our senior business editor joins us to talk Meta, brain aging, and ChatGPT’s recent dark turn.

items.title: Itch.io Is Restoring NSFW Games—as Long as They’re Free
items.description: Facing pressure from payment processors, the indie game platform delisted many adult titles this week. Itch.io began offering free NSFW content again ...
